column2: WATER & CHEMICALS - Discloses a time-bound commitment/roadmap to eliminate the use of hazardous chemicals as aligned with international standards such as ZDHC and REACH
column3: WATER & CHEMICALS - Discloses measurable progress towards eliminating the use of hazardous chemicals as aligned with international standards such as ZDHC and REACH
column4: WATER & CHEMICALS - Publishes supplier wastewater test results, such as in alignment with Detox campaign commitments
column5: WATER & CHEMICALS - Publishes annual water footprint in company’s owned and operated facilities (e.g. head office, retail stores, distribution centres, warehouses, etc.)
column6: WATER & CHEMICALS - Publishes annual water footprint at manufacturing and/or processing facility level
column7: WATER & CHEMICALS - Publishes annual water footprint at fibre production and/or raw material level
column8: WATER & CHEMICALS - Discloses process or methodology for conducting water-related risk assessments
